markdownRemark.html:
When deploying a MongoDB powered NodeJS API you’ll be asked to setup a MongoDB Atlas account with whitelisted connections from anywhere. I got stuck on this part as Atlas enforces you to whitelist specific APIs.

As seen here, the trick is to use a CIDR-notated IP address with value 0.0.0.0/0.

frontmatter.title: How to allow access from anywhere in MongoDB Atlas
frontmatter.description: Critical step when setting up an API with Vercel
